sqlMap.select:
SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT F.PRT_AT_CODE , A.PRT_AT_KOR_NM AS PRT_AT_KOR_NM , F.CMPL_YR , F.CONST_NO , F.AGENT_CODE , F.SOC_PRT_AT_CODE , B.PRT_AT_KOR_NM AS SOC_PRT_AT_KOR_NM , F.SOC_CNST_NM , F.CNST_LOC , F.AGENT_NAME , F.AGENT_ADDR , F.AGENT_OWNER , F.SOC_OBJ , F.SOC_GIGIAN , F.SOC_WIDTH , F.SOC_NATION , F.SOC_PRIVATE , TO_CHAR(F.APRV_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS APRV_DT , TO_CHAR(F.PERF_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PERF_DT , TO_CHAR(F.CMPL_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CMPL_DT , TO_CHAR(F.START_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DT , TO_CHAR(F.MODIFY_DT1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DT1 , TO_CHAR(F.MODIFY_DT2,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MODIFY_DT2 , F.MODIFY_TXT , F.PRIME_TXT , F.TOTAL_AMNT , F.ACC_FEE , F.RESERACH_AMNT , F.PURE_AMNT , F.EXTRA_AMNT1 , F.EXTRA_AMNT2 , F.EXTRA_AMNT3 , F.EXTRA_AMNT4 , F.REMARK , TO_CHAR(F.MANAGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MANAGE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.ASSET_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ASSET_DT , TO_CHAR(F.FREEUSE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FREEUSE_DT , TO_CHAR(F.OTHER_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS OTHER_DT , TO_CHAR(F.FREEFR_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FREEFR_DT , TO_CHAR(F.FREETO_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS FREETO_DT , F.RANGE , F.BZ_RGST_ID , F.UPDT_UID , TO_CHAR(F.UPDT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS UPDT_DATE FROM P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR A ON (A.PRT_AT_CODE=F.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B ON (B.PRT_AT_CODE=F.SOC_PRT_AT_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.AGENT_CODE LIKE #sAgentCode#||'%'
AND F.AGENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#sAgentName#||'%'
ORDER BY F.CMPL_YR DESC, F.UPDT_DATE DESC ) S ) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL_CNT FROM P2MGR.SOC_AGENT_F@YGPA_P2MGR F LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR A ON (A.PRT_AT_CODE=F.PRT_AT_CODE) LEFT OUTER JOIN P2MGR.PRT_AT_CODE_F@YGPA_P2MGR B ON (B.PRT_AT_CODE=F.SOC_PRT_AT_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND F.PRT_AT_CODE = #sPrtAtCode#
AND F.AGENT_CODE LIKE #sAgentCode#||'%'
AND F.AGENT_NAME LIKE '%'||#sAgentName#||'%'
